attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all councils collecting rubbish fortnightly in order to reduce pests e.g. rats. By collecting weekly without mandatory recycling by the councils would reduce rubbish build up which could lead to an increase in fly tipping, councils shouldnt be allowed to impose fines on people that wont cooperate with the collection policy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
